SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.engine

Class Pos<D extends Dim>

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.engine.Pos<D>
Type Parameters:
D - The dimension type for this position
public class Pos<D extends Dim> extends Object
Represents a position in n-dimensional space. Supports 1D, 2D, 3D, and 4D positioning with appropriate dimension tracking.
See Also:
  • For vector operations in the same dimensional space
  • The base dimensional interface

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Pos(float x)
    Creates a 1D position with the specified X coordinate.
    Pos(float x, float y)
    Creates a 2D position with the specified X and Y coordinates.
    Pos(float x, float y, float z)
    Creates a 3D position with the specified X, Y, and Z coordinates.
    Pos(float x, float y, float z, float special)
    Creates a 4D position with the specified X, Y, Z, and special coordinates.

      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate of the other point
      y - Y coordinate of the other point
      Returns:
      The distance between this position and the specified coordinates

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this position. Format varies based on dimension: {x}, {x,y}, {x,y,z}, or {x,y,z,special}.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String representation of the position
